website_summaries.verdict: A reasonable upgrade from the typical cheap, thin wok. Thick nonstick coating is a major strength.
cons: Suitability on induction burners is questionable

customer_reviews.title: TeChef 12" Art Pan Wok - A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the 12" TeChef wok for almost 2 years and it's held up beautifully. It's had heavy use (4-5 times/week) as I cook almost everything in it. The finish shows some wear and tear as Ive only used silicone, nylon, and wooden utensils but the finish has held up nicely. The chips and scrapes haven't flaked or enlarged in anyway. If you like to cook stir-fry or anything really it's definitely worth picking up :-)
customer_reviews.author: BryanS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by the product description.
customer_reviews.text: Think twice when you read the description “The world's finest cookware with DuPont Teflon Select ...” You will be very lucky if the coating of the pan can last you more than a year. You will be dreaming if you think Techef will honor what they claim on the description of “Lifetime warranty”. Don’t waste your money with this company, Get you pan from other reputable sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: It is made beautifully and even tho it does not fit any of ...
customer_reviews.text: I only received this today ..I don't know what I was seeing when I ordered it ..somehow I thought it was a bronzy color but in actuality it is an eggplant color ..Just wanted to let people know in case their computer doesn't show it . It is made beautifully and even tho it does not fit any of my décor ..I will be keeping it because It seems like a very well made product and it comes packaged excellently...
customer_reviews.author: Bina

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for t fel and this came up,after finding this pan is made in Korean I decided to give it a try . The pan is so beautiful in person.(it doesn't look like the color shows on sellers photo ,it's purple in person) Its very nicely made ,light ,non stick , and it also has a little logo showing you how much oil you pour into the pan. Also ,it is very easy to clean ! Definitely recommend it !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: shwanny

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low. I HATE that most woks/pans have the rivets on the inside of the 'bowl'. The 12" lid from another product I have (think large direct sales very pricey company) fits perfectly allowing me to use this for even more stuff. It is supper easy to clean up and the color is lovely. I'm definitely considering purchasing other items in this line.
customer_reviews.author: Staynegative

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Update: Unfortunately, it lasted less than a month when the coating started peeling off. I am only using the silicone spatula. Kinda disappointed. Original: I’ve been using the wok a lot for weeks. It’s very well made and nonstick as it’s supposed to be. Hope it will last long and let’s see.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee lover

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased, this is a good product
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! This is as deep as I wanted to keep some of the grease spatters off the black stove top (note: never buy black stove tops - they show every little crumb and splatter.) I've been putting food on low heat in this pan, covering it with the see-through lid, and just wandering off for a few minutes to come back and find it is browning evenly.. Absolutely minimal oil required and is really non-stick. I'm very pleased, this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C

customer_reviews.title: I really like using this stir-fry pan for everything on my stove
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase at this time. I really like using this stir-fry pan for everything on my stove. This is not that heavy, but not that light in its weight. For me, just right heavy pan would work best for everyday cooking with easy washing. This one is just it. My first one has worked best, but as all knows, we need to replace non-stick pan on a regular basis. My replacement should be the same TeChef one. Now I am happy with my all the frying work with this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Soyoung L.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great pan
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant in the beginning but This has become my go to pan. It’s big and deep enough, holds heats well and super easy to clean. Love the lid and it’s just wonderful for the value
customer_reviews.author: E K A

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to get a new pan in 6 month
customer_reviews.text: At first the pan is good, but as many reviewers have mentioned it would not last for too long. I understand that non-stick pan would not last forever but we only bought this pan 6 month ago. Now it has completely lost its non-stick function. If we fried 3 eggs then we can probably eat only 1 egg, 2 others are stuck on the pan. Thinking that we do not cook that much before the corona virus this pans performance is even more disappointing. Now we have to get a new pan.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Great non stick wok
customer_reviews.text: Plastic handle partially melted and released funky smell uon heating. We thought the pan was releasing toxic gas upon heating. Otherwise great non stick pan under heavy use. Last much longer than other pans I got over the years. The non stick layer still looks intact after about half a year. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jianfang Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: So, it's not too often I get excited about a non-stick pan, but I love this thing. I had an old electric WOK I did not like. The non-stick would blacken and wear out quickly. Admittedly, it's a bit too early to know the longevity of this pan (and I'll update the review later), but I've used the pan as a WOK many times now, cooked eggs, bacon and lots of other stuff in it and 1) it still looks new, 2) the non-stick coating has not discolored, i.e., it is holding up well and 3) it has the most non-stickiness of any non-stick pan I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Gage

customer_reviews.title: Great wok. We make stir fry all the time ...
customer_reviews.text: Great wok. We make stir fry all the time and this pan is perfect for it. Definitely recommend getting the cover as well. It is beautifully designed and we have never had food get stuck or burned onto it. It is ample size and easy to maneuver when making stir fry. Would absolutely buy it again,
customer_reviews.author: Richard Couder

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size with high sides. I may never bother to use my wok again, this is more useful for my needs. Non stick appears to be very duragle.
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: Tech chef
customer_reviews.text: Nice pan, however it came dented at the top. Poor quality control. I am keeping keeping it, not worth the hassle of returning. The lid still stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: A good multi-purpose kitchen tool for the home cook.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wok for about three weeks now. So far I'm pretty happy with it. The wok has good weight but is small enough to handle. The bottom has a stainless plate that distributes the heat. The card instructs you to not use high heat so I keep it at 7 on my electric range. Eggs don't stick at all. I've stir-fried vegetables, fried rice, made scrambled egg dishes and other sticky dishes. The nonstick coating seems pretty thick. The rim and the outside of the pan is also coated in the same nonstick coating so cleanup is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' this Perfect sized pan, quality & protective purposes.
customer_reviews.text: Loving this quality 9.5" wok/stir-fry size. It is not oversized like my last purchase of another brand. This is the perfect width & depth for just about anything. It's a heavy weight because of the extra coatings & PFOA free of chemical release is a buying point right up front. Beautiful design & color. Practical & multi-purpose. I can see this will be a go to pan from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kokonana

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this pan
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this pan. I am by no means an expert chef but I have made so many food items such as pasta, curry, fried rice. This pan is awesome for cooking a large quantity of food as well as putting all the ingredients into one spot. Not to mention it is SUPER easy to clean, a MUST own for anybody that is looking to step up their cooking game!
customer_reviews.author: Kimulus

customer_reviews.title: The coating dies after 4 month of heavy usage.
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it does a great job. However, the coating dies after 4-month of heavy usage during COVID. We all used wood cooking turner and always cleaned it with soft material. Now it becomes sticky since probably due to the coating condition.
customer_reviews.author: Xu Wang

customer_reviews.title: Love my pan!
customer_reviews.text: If there were 10 stars, I would give it a 10. This pan does everything and I mean everything. Clean up is easy. I plan to get one for everyone on my Christmas list. I have been cooking for a family for over 45 years and this is the best pan I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Janet S.

customer_reviews.title: If you buy just one pan...
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my daughter who has graduated from college and onto apartment living. she is very appreciative the higher quality cookware and tells me that she tossed all of her fry pans and uses this one solely. It requires very little if any oil and cleans up nicely. Works for sautéing, woking, braising, all of it. I bought it bundled with the lid and Kloud City wooden utensils. All in all, it makes a very nice package for gifting or just using.
customer_reviews.author: goodherbs

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Pan was amazing for about a month. I use it a LOT. After about a month it became impossible to cook anything in this pan without it sticking. And what's the point of a lifetime warranty when the company doesn't reply to emails? Save your money. EDIT: 2 years later and still no word from the company after several emails.
customer_reviews.author: nags

customer_reviews.title: Great Wok
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pan for awhile and its amazing. The deep purple and even tho the lid is pretty expensive they are really nice together. I've been a stickler for keeping my roommates away from it and not going above a 7 out of 10 on the stove top and the non-stick coating is still holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite pan
customer_reviews.text: Cooks very evenly, absolutely in love with the oil measurement feature, very comfortable to use, has wonderful high walls, easy to clean. takes a little longer to heat up than you would expect but works well, will probably order more from this collection
customer_reviews.author: Lilaabean

customer_reviews.title: Use this pan for everything
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. It may be a pretend hexclad, but it’s much cheaper. Good heat distribution, easy clean up. I use it for everything, eggs, frying, sautéing, one pot dinners!
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and durable stir-fry pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is just what I was looking for - thick and durable - almost like a cross between a wok and a heavy fry pan. The traditional woks I've bought in the past had very thin walls and would heat up much faster, but the coating would burn off after a few uses. I don't think I'll have that issue with this one!
customer_reviews.author: B. Boehler

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I cooked with it a few times and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Great product, recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this wok last week and I have already used it twice to make a stir-fry and fried rice. It has worked wonderfully! The pan is easy to clean, heats up evenly, and is very durable. I really like the fact that I can pour a specific amount of oil into the middle of the pan without needing to measure anything (the pan has indicators for 1 tsp and 3 tsps). It is also large so it can accommodate lots of veggies when I make a healthy stir-fry. Overall, this is a great buy that I will personally get a lot of use out of.
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to pan!
customer_reviews.text: The TeChef Wok is absolutely amazing. I've paid nearly twice as much for other pans that were half the quality. The pan is extremely versatile, easy to clean, and lasts for years of daily use. In fact, I'm on my second pan and am reluctant to ever buy a different brand of pans again. I highly recommend you try the TeChef pans!
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Its deep enough to not spill the food you're cooking and can easily wash off the residuals as it is non-sticky coated. Make sure you don't scrub off the residuals as that would damage the nonsticky surface.
customer_reviews.author: Skyhigh

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Have had it for about half a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Have had it for about half a year and have used it near daily. It's starting to wear a bit on the edge though. Still a awesome product; all coatings will wear so not unexpected. I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: but works as intended non stick easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The final layer coating? will get scratched by wood utensils. kinda disturbing. Kinda Eh about durability. but works as intended non stick easy to clean. heats up fairly quick.
customer_reviews.author: Gk

customer_reviews.title: close to being a wok star
customer_reviews.text: This gave me two years of very heavy use before the coating started to go. That's above average for nonstick. I love the size and the flat bottom gives it real versatility.
customer_reviews.author: rpg

customer_reviews.title: Can't be used as a wok.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan specifically to replace my old wok. Guess what the instructions say? Can't use high or even high heat. It gets three stars for being a good non-stick pan (I use is for other things), but without being able to use heat to sear, I still need to find a wok.
customer_reviews.author: lwg

customer_reviews.title: It heat up slowly, but it’s ok after I get used to, ❤️ It.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking wok, very elegant! Easy to clean but I suggest to use silicone utensils only, not even wooden utensil, I used once, it look like has a scratch after, may be my wooden spoon edge kind of sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Fai Leung

customer_reviews.title: Love my pan
customer_reviews.text: Was so happy with this pan that i bought 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: song kim

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: This the third time I buy this wok, like it
customer_reviews.author: For S

customer_reviews.title: New favorite pan!
customer_reviews.text: Great pan. My new go-to. It's heavy though, if that matters--it's all in the pan though, which means you get good heat distribution and retention. You can sear meat using the sloped sides, which is nice for when you're making a large quantity. Their lid works wonderfully too--good idea to get them as a package.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pan renews my hope for lasting a little longer because it is nicely coated. The pan heated much more evenly so ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't remember how many non-stick stir fry pans I have gone through. Most will last for only about a year before it starts to burn my food because it starts sticking. This pan renews my hope for lasting a little longer because it is nicely coated. The pan heated much more evenly so I'll only need to use medium high on the gas stove and still gives a nice brown coating on food. Time will tell if this pan will last.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great Durable Wok Stir Fry Pan!
customer_reviews.text: My mother gave me this wok pan as a gift a few years ago and it’s amazing. I have gotten so many uses out of it and it is just a great stir fry pan. I liked it so much that. I just purchased it again to replace mine just from wear from having it for so long. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wok
customer_reviews.text: Love this wok! Very sturdy and this came with a top when most dont have tops. The glass is thick enough to stand the heat. Well made Wok the Wok from another brand rusted but the coat on this one is coated well. I reccomend this to anyone who want a quality wok!
customer_reviews.author: jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is excellent. Nothing sticks and a nice size. I use it for practically everything and the brown color is a pleasant plus.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy and heat slow
customer_reviews.text: It's super heavy and no support handle. Heat very slowly. The worst wok I ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Sheng Jiao

customer_reviews.title: Great, deep fry pan that is truly non-stick.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan to replace a standard Wearever pan I'd had for several years. I chose this because of the glowing reviews from most reviewers, and they were right. People should know that this is a DEEP pan, which is really great for practical use. There has never been anything stick to this pan since I've been using it. I don't think I'll ever buy a cheap pan again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Best Cooking Purchase I have Made So Far
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase that I have made for the kitchen. I had always wanted a wok to make cooking some meals easier to hold and I saw some positive reviews of this one, so went for it. That was two years ago. During that time I have cooked almost all of my meals in this. So much so that the handle broke and the company sent a new handle. The one I bought two years ago was losing its non-stick surface (likely from my cleaning), so I bought this same one again. It is really worth it and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: William M Dungey

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. Works well, i spray some olive oil on the pan and throw in ny eggs and they come out perfect. Like an infomecial perfect. I have no complaints worth this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: So versatile and no problem!
customer_reviews.text: I'm starting to cook everything in this pan - pancakes, chicken, stir fry, scrambled eggs. Super easy to clean and easy to cook in. No sticking! Better than a wok if you have a stove top with no flames because the flat surface heats better than a round wok. Get the lid that slowly releases steam too!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Vassaur

customer_reviews.title: Great stir fry pan!
customer_reviews.text: After spending more and more dinners throwing together a quick stir fry and trying not to stir the veggies out of the pan and onto the range in the early stage (or find the noodles or rice stuck to the pan) this wok pan works well for my purposes. I use wooden cooking utensils and keep the heat from scorching, and so far, the non-stick coating does really well. The pan is elegant looking too, which isn't necessary, but definitely a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Pan
customer_reviews.text: Love the Pan. I cook all my stew, currry, noodle items all in it. Easy to clean and doesn't burn.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: does not last
customer_reviews.text: teflon coating completely gone after 5 years of use. Surface down to bare aluminum
customer_reviews.author: f. miller

customer_reviews.title: Hands down has become my favorite kitchen
customer_reviews.text: been using this ALOT since I purchased it. Hands down has become my favorite kitchen pot/pan
customer_reviews.author: Chris Channell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, sides of pan make it versatile
customer_reviews.text: First ever wok type pan. Easy to clean if I wipe down immediately afterwards. Great versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great wok!
customer_reviews.text: A great wok, good size for plenty of types of cooking, stir fry, eggs, meat. You can throw the food around plenty without spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: this is the most non-stick wok i have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time to buy this product. The non-stick coating works well and is very durable. It is vulnerable to scratches though. It is heavy and that is a good thing because you don't want to let it cool down too much when the food is put in.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: ... much non-stick and light enough for me to maneuver comfortably. Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very much non-stick and light enough for me to maneuver comfortably. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Boot-satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I did with this pan was fry some noodles and wow, they turned out perfect. Very nice quality. Highly recommend this pan. I even like the little oil measuring indicator on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Jack D. Menendez

customer_reviews.title: I much prefer a classic wok shape better.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nonstick pan for general use. Im not a fan of the shape for actual stir fry. I much prefer a classic wok shape better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wok Pan working great, Very Slick
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times so far, but it works as advertised. Make sure you heat it up slowly and it gets great heat at medium high flame that transfers through the entire Pan quickly. The Non Stick surfaces is so slick I have to be careful not to stir my veggies out of the Bowl. In my traditional Wok I stir much more vigorously, but I need to tone it down in this pan. Nice and Big too.
customer_reviews.author: Dana775

customer_reviews.title: great wok!
customer_reviews.text: great first wok! We have been trying many new recipes and are eating a lot healthier. we love the long green beans cooked in the wok.
customer_reviews.author: lavenda d mccommon

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: Now I can get wok-like results on an electric stove. Nice heavy stirfry pan
customer_reviews.author: Ric Hoogestraat

customer_reviews.title: TeChef 12" Wok/Stir-Fry pan
customer_reviews.text: This 12 inch wok/skillet is wonderful. The generous depth allows for plenty of room to work without scattering food and noodles all over the stove. Clean up is a breeze, the pan is a good weight and the measurement mark on the bottom of the pan is surprisingly useful.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest Reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect non-stick wok!
customer_reviews.text: Really terrific non-stick wok! The deep purple color is very subtle. Weight is just right (not too heavy, not too lightweight). Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila A. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: My one go-to pan
customer_reviews.text: Great pan. Use it more than any other. Great shape. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Heaps

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance for Christmas; he loves cooking Asian cuisine and has been wanting one forever. He loves it! It's great quality and feels authentic.
customer_reviews.author: nichov

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying cooking with this. Great for putting lots of stuff in and not having food spill out.
customer_reviews.author: Latman

customer_reviews.title: I love these pans
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans. My favorite non-sticks. I've ordered a couple of different sizes now. Pair it with the tempered glass lids, they are heavy duty and come with proper ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: tech_guy

customer_reviews.title: well-crafted nonstick wok!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new Teflon non-stick wok, and this one fit the bill. It feels solid and well-made, and has a decently sized flat cooking surface (as well as a cute oil-measuring graphic on the bottom so you don't use too much oil!). Can't wait to use it to stir fry! The only downside is that it doesn't come with a lid (has to be purchased separately).
customer_reviews.author: Altair

customer_reviews.title: It worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Wok. It heats up fast, and it's not sticky like some other bad wok. it feels well made. it's not too big or small. we have two people in the household, it works for us. I like stir fry, so this is a great choice of wok!
customer_reviews.author: S.L.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, decent value
customer_reviews.text: It works great at first, but I'm finding that the coating has come off after about 6 months of use with good care. I had to search high and low to find out that this is also not oven proof.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great WOK!
customer_reviews.text: Great wok! Very durable coating. east to clean, heavy, quality made and the same size as other common pans so my other pan lids fit.
customer_reviews.author: CindiE

customer_reviews.title: BIg capacity, easy cleanup, comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pan, with comfortable handle, extremely easy cleanup, and decent enough even heating. Plus, a good size capacity to it.
customer_reviews.author: GC0110

customer_reviews.title: TeChef - Art Pan 12" Wok/Stir-Fry Pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. The pan is deep, sturdy, and has a nice plum color on the side. I would recommend this to anyone who loves to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Grace T. Mondina

customer_reviews.title: Great pan with unique color.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this pan . It has beautiful and unique color. The pan is as advertised. It cooks food evenly without burning the food. I also like the size and depth of the pan so food does not overflow out of the pan. I like it so much i am going to purchase another pan and hope to keep buying the TeChef brand for years to come. I would highly endorse this pan to anyone who enjoys cooking.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for almost 2 months now, everyday, and it is very good. Its non-stick surface works great and the coating still looks sturdy. I'm considering it as my favorite non-stick pan.
customer_reviews.author: R.S

customer_reviews.title: effective and considerate! It delivers heat very quickly. ...
customer_reviews.text: effective and considerate! It delivers heat very quickly. Most importantly, I don't know why I always got more delicious cooking with it comparing to those cooked by other pans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! The shape approximates that of a wok. Heat distribution is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Rye

customer_reviews.title: I love TeChef. All the pots and pans are great
customer_reviews.text: I love TeChef. All the pots and pans are great. The coating is fantastic and the style is beautiful. I wish they had a larger pot. I would buy it in a minute.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan
customer_reviews.text: We use this pan virtually every day. It is durable and the high sides allow us to stir fry or sauté without having everything spill out all over the stove top. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: David Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect everything pan for a tiny apartment. Non-stick is still alive and well after months of frequent cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan; very good quality; you will love cooking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas

customer_reviews.title: Finally I got a non stick which actually serves the ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally I got a non stick which actually serves the purpose. I cook a lot of curry and it always got stuck and burnt on other pans. This is a breeze to clean as well. Though it is much bigger than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Mayank A.

customer_reviews.title: The handle was easy to hold and pan itself was not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I tried the pan the first day I got it by specifically going to the market to buy a couple of steaks. The pan heated quickly and cooked the meat evenly without issue. The handle was easy to hold and pan itself was not too heavy. In addition, the pan was very easy to clean due to the non-stick properties. Ultimately, we are very happy with our TeChef pan/wok purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wong

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing pan! It is very sturdy and does not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing pan! It is very sturdy and does not require any assembly. However the only con about this pan is that it does not come with a lid. At the time when I purchased the lid it was $20 This pan is quite deep and it defiantly will give you lots of room to stir fry your vegetables + rice and etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C

customer_reviews.title: A pleasure to use - not too heavy and great for stir frying and braising meat
customer_reviews.text: A pleasure to use - not too heavy and great for stir frying and braising meat. I love the added height and the overall size/looks, as well as the build quality of this pan. The packaging was also very lovely. A great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Panit Buranapramest

customer_reviews.title: A great pan, not just for use as a wok
customer_reviews.text: I took some time to use this pan before reviewing. It is a heavy pan. It heats evenly. I have used it to cook one-dish meals and it works wonderfully well. Best thing of all, it is easy to clean. I love this pan!
customer_reviews.author: N. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: It's refreshing to see a company really take pride in what they do and it's clear that TeChef strives to make high end products that are reasonably priced. I'm very happy with my TeChef Wok and i love their attention to detail. The tablespoon oil markings on the pan make it super convenient to just pour some on and start cooking. I really feel like i have a quality product and i look forward to purchasing more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: We looked at the videos about how good this product worked and WOW it worked great, nothing sticked to pan surface and seemed to cook faster, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Valentine Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: The best Stir Fry Pan around!
customer_reviews.text: We searched for a replacement pan that could used on any type heating surface. Our lead us to investigate TeChef. This is an excellent pan. Helpful oil measure at the bottom, show thoughtless and creativity. Buy it if love stir frying or preparing some eggs. Easy to clean. We brought the TeChef matching lid also. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Very good price & quality
customer_reviews.text: The artpan has a perfect size, i bought the 12' inch and it is suitable for cooking for myself or for 2 people. The color of the pan is very nice, quite distinguished from other pans. The pan is very easy to clean, and most important the price is very good, i checked the pans available in the walmart or meijer, most of them are overpriced for a non-sticking pan compared to this one.
customer_reviews.author: czlnigel.chen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Last year I bought the t-fal stir fry pan and the coating peeled off. So this time I chose this more expensive pan and switched to a bamboo spatulas. The coating looks durable and I think it won't have problems if I keep using the bamboo spatulas.
customer_reviews.author: liqun yu

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I wok alot. This pan is the greatest thing since sliced bread. Liked it so much I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and not too heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wok! It's a big improvement over my previous one, which was very heavy and difficult to clean. This wok is the exact opposite - I feel it's surprisingly light for its size, and cleaning it has yet to be a problem. The measurement guides in the middle of the wok are also surprisingly useful, and a nice decorative touch as well! I hope to use it for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Xu

customer_reviews.title: MY BEST EVER NON-STICK PAN
customer_reviews.text: I never had a non-stick stir fry pan as good as the TeChef. It conducted heat very well. I always melt some cheese to test the non-stick quality and this pan passed my test. It also browns evenly when I used it to toast some bread slices. Only time will tell if the coating is going to peel over time.
customer_reviews.author: BargainEye

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for! East to clean and durable. Use with gas range
customer_reviews.author: C.b.

customer_reviews.title: This is not a No-Stick surface
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product - can no longer return, otherwise I would. Touted as "The world's finest cookware with DuPont Teflon Select / Coated 5 times with DuPontTM Teflon® Print Designs" this product worked great for about 3 months and then, curiously, I found that foods began to stick to the surface. Now, several months later, I can't even fry an egg on it without first spraying it thoroughly with a Pam type product. Very disappointing for the money paid for this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roou

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good pan. Inexpensive. "Wok's" like a charm for stir-fry.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Terrible delivery experience
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, but prime delivery really sucks at this period. I do not think prime membership worth its price right now.
customer_reviews.author: Yin Zheping

customer_reviews.title: Not really a Wok
customer_reviews.text: Not really a wok as someone else said but it's a pretty good "Stir-fir Pan". Pretty heavy material, haven't had any problems after cooking with it 3 times. Will probably edit my review if there are any.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Lightweight. Easy to handle. I like the smaller size than a 14" wok. Stores easier
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good pan
customer_reviews.text: My favorite frying pan. The only thing I don't like is it's heavy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Y.

product_meta.title: TeChef - Art Pan 12" Wok/Stir-Fry Pan, Coated 5 times with Teflon Select Non-Stick Coating (PFOA Free) - 12 IN (30cm)
feature_bullets: Long Life Nonstick - New Safe PFOA Free Teflon Select / Coated 5 times with Teflon Print Designs
Extra-heavy gauge forged aluminum construction - No PFOA, No Cadmium, No Lead
Pattern on the frying pan helps to cook better and healthier food with just the right amount of oil, every time
Dishwasher Safe / Oven safe at up to 350°F
MADE IN KOREA - Delivers outstanding performance and exceptional quality
